=OMIM=

Get the number of OMIMs available:
    [http://net.icgeb.org/jbiowh-webservices/webservices/omim/count]

Get one OMIM by Id (this Id is the internal JBioWH WID that change in all DB):
    [http://net.icgeb.org/jbiowh-webservices/webservices/omim/96425881]

Get from/to OMIMs by range:
    [http://net.icgeb.org/jbiowh-webservices/webservices/omim/1/3]

Get OMIM by OMIM Id:
    [http://net.icgeb.org/jbiowh-webservices/webservices/omim/id/100300]

Search OMIMs by string using % (Search over the fields: OMIM ID and Title in this order. Use %25 for the wildcard):

    OMIM ID:
       [http://net.icgeb.org/jbiowh-webservices/webservices/omim/search/100500]
    Title (*AUTOSOMAL*):
       [http://net.icgeb.org/jbiowh-webservices/webservices/omim/search/%25AUTOSOMAL%25]


==External data links==
===!GeneInfo===
Get the !GeneInfos by Id (this Id is the internal JBioWH WID that change in all DB):
    [http://net.icgeb.org/jbiowh-webservices/webservices/omim/96425881/geneinfo]

Get the GeneInfos by OMIM Id:
    [http://net.icgeb.org/jbiowh-webservices/webservices/omim/id/100800/geneinfo]
